attributes.action: Ban Driver Instructing on Public Roads before 10am and after 3pm in England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With the increased volume of traffic on our roads, these toblerone-toped rascals are a menace to the working man (and woman) trying to get to work on time.
I suggest a curfew whereby before 10am and after 3pm the roads remain free from these irritants that are blighting our streets.
